Contentious Pennsylvania race could decide US Senate balance
CNN's Manu Raju meets with Pennsylvania Lt. Gov.
Fetterman is the front-runner for the Democratic nomination for the Pennsylvania Senate seat being vacated by GOP Sen. Pat Toomey.
John Fetterman and challengers Rep. Conor Lamb and state Rep. Malcolm Kenyatta.
